data.body:
as title says.  if the notes have data, add a newline and the words 

Rejection Reason: 

with the cursor to characters after teh colon.

if the notes have no data, do the same thing, just without the newline.

there should only be 2 buttons - reject or cancel.

if the user clicks shift-o instead of shift-v, keep that behavior the way it works now (as if these changes were never made)
